動物用藥品名稱: 百靈佳豬生殖與呼吸綜合症活毒疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣百靈佳殷格翰股份有限公司
地址: 2621 NORTH BELT HIGHWAY ST.  JOSEPH MO 64506 U.S.A.

ingredients: PORCINE REPRODUCTIVE AND RESPIRATORY SYNDROME VACCINE ,STRAIN ATCC VR-2332  RESPIRATORY FORM       AT LEASE 10^4.9 TCID50NEOMYCIN(AS PRESERVATIVE)  30MCG/ML
